titleStmt.title: A commentary upon the Acts of the Apostles, chronicall and criticall the difficulties of the text explained, and the times of the story cast into annals : the first part, from the beginning of the Booke, to the end of the twelfth chapter : with a briefe survey of the contemporary story of the Jews and Romans / by John Lightfoot ...
titleStmt.author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.C. for Andrew Crooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
"The Christian, Jewish and Roman history of the yeare[s] of Christ 34-37", have separate title-pages.
"The Roman and Jewish story, for the yeare[s] of Christ 38-44", have separate title-pages.
